Module jGame
Package jGame.core.ui.hud.fonts

Class FontManager

java.lang.Object
jGame.core.ui.hud.fonts.FontManager
public class FontManager
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a collection of fonts to be used throughout the application.
Since:
1.2.0
Author:
Nuno Pereira

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  FontManager.FontType
    Enum representing the types of fonts.

  • Method Details

    • addFont

      public static void addFont​(java.lang.String fontName, java.awt.Font font)
      Adds the specified font to this collection of fonts.
      Parameters:
      fontName - the name of the font to add
      font - the font to add
      Since:
      1.2.0

    • loadFont

      public static java.awt.Font loadFont​(java.lang.String fontFilePath, FontManager.FontType fontType) throws java.awt.FontFormatException, java.io.IOException, java.lang.SecurityException
      Loads a font from the specified path, using the specified font type.
      Parameters:
      fontFilePath - the path of the font file
      fontType - the type of font, either FontType#T1 or FontType#TTF
      Returns:
      the font specified by the file path
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the file referred to by fontFilePath cannot be read.
      java.awt.FontFormatException - if the file referred to by fontFilePath does not contain the required font tables for the specified format.
      java.lang.SecurityException - if the executing code does not have permission to read from the file referred to by fontFilePath.
      Since:
      1.2.0

    • getFont

      public static java.awt.Font getFont​(java.lang.String fontName)
      Returns the font mapped to the given fontName.
      Parameters:
      fontName - the name of the font to return
      Returns:
      the font specified by the given name
      Since:
      1.2.0

    • getDefaultFont

      public static java.awt.Font getDefaultFont()
      Returns the default font used by every element.
      Returns:
      the default font used by every element
      Since:
      1.2.0
      See Also:
      Font
